Precondition: Valid rating submission - 5 stars with comment (Normal)
Valid rating submission - 3 stars without comment (Normal)
Valid rating submission - 1 star with negative feedback (Normal)
Retrieve ratings for event with no ratings (Boundary)
Submit rating via API - valid data (Normal)
Database connection failure during rating submission (Abnormal)
Network timeout during rating summary fetch (Abnormal)
Invalid stars data type in API (Abnormal)
Type(N : Normal, A : Abnormal, B : Boundary)
